column2: SES - Business Offer Extension - Get Offer Email
This is the email that sent to the member when a member click on get offer link.

[header]

Congratulations, you have received a copun code [couponcode]. Click on the link below to visit the Offer:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
When I like a business offer
When I create a business offer.
When someone like my business offer.
When a user (subject) likes another user’s business offer (object).
When a user (subject) create a business offer (object).
When I mark a business offer as favourite.
When someone mark my business offer as favourite.
When a user (subject) mark business offer (object) as favourite.
When I mark a business offer as follow.
When someone follow my business offer.
When a user (subject) followed another user’s business offer (object).
